promptBase: ClawShield brand hero visual, secure AI agent ecosystem, futuristic but professional, bold headline area, 16:9
promptOptimized: Cinematic wide-angle hero shot of a sophisticated AI agent ecosystem, featuring a central glowing core protected by translucent hexagonal energy shields and intricate neural data networks. The aesthetic is high-end corporate tech: sleek, professional, and minimalist with polished glass and brushed metal textures. Deep navy, slate grey, and vibrant cyan color palette. Asymmetrical composition with significant clean negative space on the left for a bold headline. Volumetric lighting, soft depth of field, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, 16:9 aspect ratio.
